name: Sleep Stages
description:
Submission for Godot Wild Jam 55

Using Godot 4, the game takes a long time to load, please be patient :)

Theme: Dreams

Wildcards:

  • A Fork in the Road (Multiple ways to get a good sleep)

The goal of the game is to make good choices while awake in order to get a better sleep (more time). In your dreams you conquer your nightmares.

This is a point-and-click game with 2 mini-games and 1 fetch quest. Hope you enjoy.

I wanted to experiment with Godot 4.0 and 3d.
